* Check WLAN network protocols are supported
** Click network manager icon on panel
** From drop down list, select a WLAN (802.11b) network listed
** Launch Browser applet and enter www.cnn.com in address bar.
** From drop down list, select a WLAN (802.11g) network listed
** Launch Browser applet and enter www.cnn.com in address bar.
** From drop down list, select a WLAN (802.11n) network listed
** Launch Browser applet and enter www.cnn.com in address bar.
